resources.string: Kampus Pendidikan Nomor Satu di Bandung
This park built for every single person out there to hangout.
Very famous mountain with beautiful legend. Must visit place if you spent holiday in Bandung.
This beautiful lake is enormous. You could get beautiful sunrise here.
He you could find a mammoth fossil, earthquake simulator, history on origin of Bandung, etc..
This place is so touching if you visit with your beloved. Remember, don\'t come alone!

It\'s not as big as Niagara Waterfall, but it\'s unique. It\'s uniqueness comes from the place where it place. If you think waterfall are placed so far away from the city, you would surprised when visiting this waterfall.
This is the official mosque for Universitas Pendidikan Indonesia. The biggest on campus mosque.
This is where the future engineer of Indonesia take a rest and pray to God in ITB.
This one is the biggest mosque in Bandung and one of Bandung\'s landmark.
This mosque is where the center of Islamic in Bandung takes place.
People who visited hot spring in Ciater would pray in this mosque.
This park is built for Bandung citizen so they could watch movies together.
This park is built near the Bank Indonesia, the national bank of Indonesia which have beautiful water.
This park is built to accomodate musician that looking for place to find inspiration.
This park is built to help people of Bandung to learn photography.
This park is built for elder so they have a place to hangout safely
This institute is the most prestigious in technical education. Famous with its Informatics Engineering Department.
Leading and outstanding university in the field of education. Produce high quality teacher to bring better future.
Another prestigious university in Bandung. Unpad famous with it\'s social studies.
The state owned polytechnic is very famous among student who want to get job fast.
Owned by the biggest Telecom Company in Indonesia.
